DOC.brief_summary: Study medicine will be given alone, or in combination with either sibutramine or orlistat, to obese subjects to compare the effect on body weight over a six month period.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of MK0557 in Combination With Sibutramine or Orlistat (0557-015)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Men and women between the ages of 1865 who are considered obese (have a body mass index between 30 and 43) Subject has high blood pressure or is taking any high blood pressure medicine History of psychiatric disorder, stroke, or heart disease
